Module org.example
Package org.example.controllers

Class CustomerOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wgu.cristianreyes.controllers.CustomerOperation
  • public class CustomerOperation
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for the customer operation window used to add or update customers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  CustomerOperation.Operations
      An inner enum type used to specify the type of customer operation being performed: adding or updating a customer.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCustomer()
      Action for the saveButton when the operation field == Operations.ADD, verifies data in the form fields and saves a new Customer to the database if valid.
      private void applyResources()
      Applies language resources from the ResourceBundle in the resources field to the appropriate labels and controls.

      On action for the cancel button, confirms the cancel and closes the customer operation window.

      clears notifications from the notifications area.

      A confirmation alert confirms that the user wants to cancel the customer operation.
      private void displayBlankFieldError()
      Displays an error alert informing that a field in the form is empty.
      private Customer getCustomer()
      Initializes and returns a Customer instance with the data entered in the window's fields.

      Sets a node's style to indicate an error.
      void initialize()
      Controller initialization.
      private void modifyCustomer()
      Verifies all fields are valid, updates the selected customer, and closes the customer operation window..
      boolean noEmptyFields()
      Checks that all fields in the form are filled out, calling error display methods for any empty fields and returning whether or not all fields are filled out.
      void setCustomer​(int customerId)
      Receives the customer ID of the customer to be modified in this window.
      void setCustomerDb​(CustomerDao customerDb)
      Sets the value of customerDb field which is used to interact with the database storing customer data.

      Sets the max length of text entered in the given TextField to the given maxLength.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomerOperation

        public CustomerOperation()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Controller initialization. Lambdas within this method make the code adding event listeners to various controls much more concise than had a ChangeListener class been directly implemented.

      • cancelOperation

        public void cancelOperation()
        On action for the cancel button, confirms the cancel and closes the customer operation window.

      • confirmCancel

        private boolean confirmCancel()
        A confirmation alert confirms that the user wants to cancel the customer operation.
        Returns:
        true if user selects OK on the confirmation alert, returns false if user selects Cancel.

      • modifyCustomer

        private void modifyCustomer()
        Verifies all fields are valid, updates the selected customer, and closes the customer operation window..

      • validFields

        private boolean validFields()
        Employs various field verification methods.
        Returns:
        true if all fields are valid, false if any fields fail verification.

      • setOperation

        public void setOperation​(CustomerOperation.Operations op)
        Sets the operation field to an Operations enum. This field dictates the behavior of various methods in the controller.
        Parameters:
        op - Operations enum type specifying the type of customer operation being performed: adding or modifying. Lambdas are used within this method allowing single line statements for setting a control's action. This makes the code within more readable.

      • applyResources

        private void applyResources()
        Applies language resources from the ResourceBundle in the resources field to the appropriate labels and controls.

      • setCustomer

        public void setCustomer​(int customerId)
        Receives the customer ID of the customer to be modified in this window. Populates all form fields with the customer's current data.
        Parameters:
        customerId - the Customer ID of a customer to be modified.

      • setNumericOnly

        private void setNumericOnly​(javafx.scene.control.TextField... fields)
        For each passed in TextField, ensures that only numeric characters may be entered into the TextField.
        Parameters:
        fields - varargs list of TextFields

      • setFieldAcceptableLength

        private void setFieldAcceptableLength​(javafx.scene.control.TextField field,
                                      int maxLength)
        Sets the max length of text entered in the given TextField to the given maxLength.
        Parameters:
        field - the TextField we are applying a max length constraint to.
        maxLength - the maximum number of characters that can be entered in field.

      • updateFirstDivisions

        private void updateFirstDivisions​(java.lang.Integer countryId)
        Updates the options for the firstDivisionComboBox depending on the countryId passed in.
        Parameters:
        countryId - the countryId used to filter the possible first level division options.

      • setCustomerDb

        public void setCustomerDb​(CustomerDao customerDb)
        Sets the value of customerDb field which is used to interact with the database storing customer data.
        Parameters:
        customerDb - a CustomerDaoImpl instance.

      • getCustomer

        private Customer getCustomer()
        Initializes and returns a Customer instance with the data entered in the window's fields.
        Returns:
        Customer instance containing the data entered in the customer operation form.

      • addCustomer

        public void addCustomer()
        Action for the saveButton when the operation field == Operations.ADD, verifies data in the form fields and saves a new Customer to the database if valid. Closes the customer operation window when complete.

      • clearNotifications

        private void clearNotifications()
        clears notifications from the notifications area. A lambda within replaces a concrete implementation of the Predicate interface and allows for a concise one line statement for the whole method.

      • noEmptyFields

        public boolean noEmptyFields()
        Checks that all fields in the form are filled out, calling error display methods for any empty fields and returning whether or not all fields are filled out.
        Returns:
        true if all form fields are filled out, false if any form fields are empty.

      • highlightField

        private void highlightField​(javafx.scene.Node field)
        Sets a node's style to indicate an error.
        Parameters:
        field - the node in which there is an error.

      • displayBlankFieldError

        private void displayBlankFieldError()
        Displays an error alert informing that a field in the form is empty.
